description:
nova/doc/README.rst describes how to build the nova developer documentation but omits mention of oslo.sphinx.  The doc build requires oslo.sphinx, but oslo.sphinx is not included in requirements.txt (because oslo.sphinx is not needed to run nova).  It suffices to pip install oslo.sphinx; nova's test-requirements.txt includes oslo.sphinx, so an environment that also includes those items is good for doc building.  nova/doc/README.rst should be enhanced with such an explanation.

This bug was found in nova master pulled on Jan 2, 2014.
title: nova/doc/README.rst missing remark about oslo.sphinx
